data.name: NitroRage
data.detailed_description: NitroRage - crazy multiplayer races with weapons. Destroy your competitors using the minigun, rocket launcher, flamethrower and other guns, or abuse of the machine with a RAM-style Derby. Drive using nitro boosts, jump with springboard on the roofs of buildings, and the demolition of funiture stores and offices, find on the map new weapons. Waiting for you the most destructible environments, lots of fun, explosions and drive and nice graphics on top game engine Unreal engine 4.

data.supported_languages: English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Portuguese - Brazil, Greek, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Norwegian, Portuguese, Russian, Turkish, Finnish, Swedish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows 8, Windows 7
  • Процессор: 3 ГГц
  • Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: 256 MB Pixel Shader 3.0 (Radeon X1650/GeForce 6800* or newer)
  • DirectX: Версии 9.0
  • Сеть: Широкополосное подключение к интернету
  • Место на диске: 2 GB
  • Звуковая карта: Sound card compatible with DirectX
pc_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: windows 10
  • Видеокарта: 1 GB Pixel Shader 3.0 (Radeon X3000 Series/GeForce 8000* or newer)
  • DirectX: Версии 9.0
  • Место на диске: 2 GB
  • Звуковая карта: Sound card compatible with DirectX
